item.description:
Observe winter’s quiet beauty as you take a 2.5 mile hike along the East Head Reservoir Trail. Learn about the adaptations necessary for wildlife to survive this cold and challenging season.

At the end, we'll have a campfire for you to warm up by! This is a great way to spend time outdoors with the family.

Meet at Headquarters parking lot at 194 Cranberry Road in South Carver. Hike length and route may be altered due to trail conditions and weather. Dress for the weather; winter boots are required. Rain,snow, or icy trails will cancel.

Call the DCR at (508)866-2580 x 162 for more information or to check weather cancellation information the morning of the hike. (Any severe weather cancellation decisions are usually not made until the last few hours before the hike. We will attempt to post any such notification here if we get it in time.  Best bet if you are in doubt is to call the number above.)

For additional Myles Standish State Forest park information, park maps and driving directions, visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm

These DCR group hikes can get large. In the past, new members to this Meetup have had a challenge to find the "Friends" group.  Perhaps we can make an effort to identify ourselves somehow-- suggestions are welcome. We have attractive group T-shirts but they are usually not prominently displayed in January. (These shirts are available from the Friends website at http://www.friendsmssf.com/ )

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Winter Family Hike
